pageText: Roro the little dinosaur loved to play. His mommy and daddy dinosaur loved him very much. They lived near a big, sleepy mountain. One sunny morning, the mountain made a tiny, funny sound. 'Rumble, rumble,' it went.
imagePrompt: Cute toddler dinosaur Roro playing with his mommy and daddy dinosaur near a big, green, sleepy volcano, sunny day, happy family, simple cartoon style.

pageText: The mountain made a louder sound! 'RUMBLE, RUMBLE!' The ground wiggled a little. Mommy and Daddy looked worried. Roro, who was small but brave, saw a big, strong tree. 'This way!' he squeaked, pointing with his little claw.
imagePrompt: Cute toddler dinosaur Roro, mommy and daddy dinosaur looking worried as a volcano rumbles loudly, Roro points to a big, strong tree, ground shaking slightly, simple cartoon style.

pageText: Mommy and Daddy knew Roro was right! They quickly followed Roro to the big tree. Then Roro saw a path behind the tree, leading to a gentle, green hill far away. 'Follow me!' he called, wiggling his tail. His family hurried after him, holding hands.
imagePrompt: Cute toddler dinosaur Roro leading his mommy and daddy dinosaur on a path behind a big tree, heading towards a gentle, green hill in the distance, family holding hands, quick movement, simple cartoon style.

pageText: They reached the green hill, just in time! 'BOOM!' went the mountain, but it was far away. Roro and his family were safe. They hugged and felt happy. Roro was a very brave little dinosaur who helped his family!
imagePrompt: Cute toddler dinosaur Roro, mommy and daddy dinosaur hugging on a safe, green hill, a volcano erupting gently in the far distance, family is smiling and happy, simple cartoon style.
